setup_commands: apt-get update && apt-get install -y meson ninja-build build-essential pkg-config libavcodec-dev libavformat-dev libswscale-dev libavfilter-dev libavutil-dev libass-dev libluajit-5.1-dev libjpeg-dev libuchardet-dev libplacebo-dev

meson setup build && meson compile -C build && meson test -C build
meson setup build && meson compile -C build && meson test -C build

mkdir -p subprojects && git clone https://code.videolan.org/videolan/libplacebo.git --recurse-submodules --shallow-submodules --depth=1 --branch v6.338 subprojects/libplacebo && meson setup build -Dlibplacebo:subproject=true && meson compile -C build && meson test -C build
